member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.DSP.Conditioning.Synchronization.#cctor
member.summary: constructor, execute when first call any method

summary.para: Synchronize method that makes all the input channels simultaneous.
This method only applies to bandlimited signal such as sinusoidal waveform.
1 Array size should be numberOfChannels * SamplesPerChannel.
2 Size of return array will be smaller than input array because of settlepoints truncation.
Simplified Chinese:同步输入信号(仅限带限信号，比如正弦信号)
注意：1数组的大小必须是通道数*每通道抽样点数
2由于使用了滤波器使得返回数组的大小小于输入信号
Synchronize method that makes all the input channels simultaneous.
This method only applies to bandlimited signal such as sinusoidal waveform.
1 Array size should be numberOfChannels * SamplesPerChannel.
2 Size of return array will be smaller than input array because of settlepoints truncation.
Simplified Chinese:同步输入信号(仅限带限信号，比如正弦信号)
注意：1数组的大小必须是通道数*每通道抽样点数
2由于使用了滤波器使得返回数组的大小小于输入信号

param.name: ChannelShiftSamples
param.para: Channel to Channel delay in Sample points
Simplified Chinese:通道之间延迟的抽样点数

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a ramp pattern specified by the first value and delta.
Chinese Simplified: 产生一个等差数列，数列的项数由数组x的长度给出，首项由start给出，公差由delta给出。

param.name: x
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 返回的等差数列

param.name: start
param.para: the first value of ramp pattern.
Chinese Simplified: 等差数列的首项

param.name: delta
param.para: the interval between two adjacent values in ramp pattern.
Chinese Simplified: 等差数列的公差

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a sine wave with specified frequency and sampling rate.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个正弦波形，可设定正弦波的幅度、初始相位、频率和采样率。

param.name: x
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 返回的正弦波形。

param.name: phase
param.para: the initial phase of the sine wave in degrees.
Chinese Simplified: 初始相位，以角度(Degree)为单位。

param.name: frequency
param.para: the frequency of sine wave in Hz.
Chinese Simplified: 正弦波的频率，以Hz为单位。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: the sampling rate of sine wave in samples/second.
Chinese Simplified: 采样率，以S/s为单位。

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a sine wave with complete periods.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个包含整数个周期的正弦波形，可设定正弦波的幅度、初始相位和周期数。

param.name: x
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 返回的正弦波形。

param.name: phase
param.para: the initial phase of the sine wave in degrees.
Chinese Simplified: 初始相位，以角度(Degree)为单位。

param.name: numberOfCycles
param.para: the number of complete periods of the sine wave.
Chinese Simplified: 正弦波周期数。

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a square wave with complete periods.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个包含整数个周期的方波波形，可设定方波的幅度、占空比和周期数。

param.name: x
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 返回的方波波形。

param.name: dutyCycle
param.para: the percentage of time the square wave remains high in one period.
Chinese Simplified: 占空百分比，为0~100之间的数值。

param.name: numberOfCycles
param.para: the number of complete periods of the square wave.

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a square wave with specified frequency and sampling rate.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个方波波形，可设定方波的幅度、占空比、频率和采样率。

param.name: x
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 返回的方波波形。

param.name: dutyCycle
param.para: the percentage of time the square wave remains high in one period.
Chinese Simplified: 占空百分比，为0~100之间的数值。

param.name: frequency
param.para: the frequency of square wave in Hz.
Chinese Simplified: 方波的频率，以Hz为单位。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: the sampling rate of square wave in samples/second.
Chinese Simplified: 采样率，以S/s为单位。

summary.para: Generates a uniformly distributed pseudorandom sequence in the range [–amplitude, amplitude].
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个幅度在[–amplitude, amplitude]之间的随机白噪声波形。

param.name: x
param.para: contains the uniformly distributed, pseudorandom sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的白噪声波形。

param.name: amplitude
param.para: the amplitude of uniform white noise.

summary.para: The step size of the sliding window is 1/4*FrequencyBins
Chinese Simplified: 时频联合分析。
窗类型默认汉明窗，窗滑动的步径为1/4*FrequencyBins
Chinese Simplified：FFT谱线数，默认512，推荐使用2的整数幂
Chinese Simplified: 频谱输出信息(只读)。

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.DSP.JTFA.JTFATask.JTFAInformation.FFTSize
member.summary: 每次计算FFT时的长度，即每次应输入的时域波形长度。

param.name: inputWaveform
param.para: The input signal of the system
Chinese Simplified：待测系统的输入信号

param.name: outputWaveform
param.para: The output signal of the system
Chinese Simplified：经过待测系统的信号

summary.para: Calculates the THD and level of all components of the input signal.
component levels in voltage peak which is 1.414*rms
if the specified highest harmonic is higher than nyquest freq,
the exceeded frequency components will be 0;
Chinese Simplified：计算输入信号总谐波失真以及谐波分量
component levels为有效值的1.414倍（单位V2）
component[0]为直流分量的功率; [1]为基波的功率; ...
如果指定的最高谐波高于奈奎斯特频率，则超过频率分量将为0;

param.name: timewaveform
param.para: the waveform of input signal assuming in voltage

param.name: dt
param.para: Chinese Simplified：时域波形的抽样间隔

param.name: detectedFundamentalFreq
param.para: the _calculated peak tone frequency in the range of search

param.name: THD
param.para: total harmonic distortion in scale = sqrt(sum(harmonics power) / fundamental power)

param.name: componentsLevel
param.para: in voltage peak which is 1.414*rms, [0]for DC [1] for fundamental

param.name: highestHarmonic
param.para: the highest order to analysis, if too high, the exceeded harmonics level will be 0

summary.para: Chinese Simplified: 计算信号的频谱。
Computes the power spectrum of input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 计算输入信号的功率频谱。

param.name: x
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 输入的时域波形。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: sampling rate of the input time-domain signal, in samples per second.
Chinese Simplified: 输入信号的采样率，以S/s为单位。

param.name: spectrum
param.para: output sequence containing the power spectrum.

param.name: df
param.para: the frequency resolution of the spectrum, in hertz.
Chinese Simplified: 功率谱的频谱间隔，以Hz为单位。

param.name: unit
param.para: unit of the output power spectrum
Chinese Simplified: 设置功率谱的单位。

param.name: windowType
param.para: the time-domain window to apply to the time signal.

param.name: windowPara
param.para: parameter for _demoniator Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev window, If window is any other window, this parameter is ignored
Chinese Simplified: 窗调整系数，仅用于Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev窗。

param.name: PSD
param.para: specifies whether the output power spectrum is converted to power spectral density.
Chinese Simplified: 输出的频谱是否为功率谱密度。

summary.para: Computes the power spectrum of input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 计算输入信号的功率频谱。

param.name: x
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 输入的时域波形。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: sampling rate of the input time-domain signal, in samples per second.
Chinese Simplified: 输入信号的采样率，以S/s为单位。

param.name: spectrum
param.para: output sequence containing the power spectrum.

param.name: df
param.para: the frequency resolution of the spectrum, in hertz.
Chinese Simplified: 功率谱的频谱间隔，以Hz为单位。

param.name: unitSettings
param.para: unit settings of the output power spectrum
Chinese Simplified: 设置功率谱的单位。

param.name: windowType
param.para: the time-domain window to apply to the time signal.

param.name: windowPara
param.para: parameter for _demoniator Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev window, If window is any other window, this parameter is ignored
Chinese Simplified: 窗调整系数，仅用于Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev窗。

members.member:
Get the fundamental frequency and array of harmonic power.
the waveform of input signal assuming in voltage sampling interval of timewaveform (_status) the _calculated peak tone frequency the _calculated peak tone voltage peak amplitude, which is 1.414*RMS i.e. peakSignal=peakAmp*sin(2*pi*peakFreq*t)
